abstract: Democrat Sylvester Turner wins mayoral election in Houston, defeating Republican businessman Bill King and succeeding current Democratic Mayor Annise D Parker; victory ensures largest city in Texas remains in Democrat's hands.
lead_paragraph: State Representative Sylvester Turner defeated Bill King, a Republican-leaning businessman, to keep the largest city in Texas in Democratic hands.

headline.print_headline: Democrats Keep Mayoral Seat in Houston

snippet: State Representative Sylvester Turner defeated Bill King, a Republican-leaning businessman, to keep the largest city in Texas in Democratic hands.
